page.title: 18WHAT DO WE LIKE TO EAT?
page.content: OUR MID-DAY MEAL COMES FROM THE JUNIOR SCHOOL AT MELBOURNE. EVERY CHILD IN THE SCHOOL STAYS. THERE HAS BEEN NO DISRUPTION DURING THE RECENT TEACHERS' DISPUTE. WE DISCUSSED WHAT THE INFANTS LIKE TO EAT. SIMON'S FAVOURITE MEAL IS SAUSAGES AND CHIPS; DANIEL'S IS SPAGHETTI HOOPS, SAUSAGES AND PEAS; EMILY'S IS FISHFINGERS, TOMATO SAUCE AND MASH; MICHAEL'S IS MILK, CARROTS, ONIONS AND ORANGES; RICHARD'S IS MILK,CHIPS, SAUSAGES AND TOMATOES; JONATHAN'S IS FISHFINGERS, PEAS AND CHIPS; PAUL'S IS MILKSHAKE, STEW, POTATOES AND PEAS. PUDDINGS WE LIKE ARE CHEESECAKE, RICE, YOGHURT, APPLE PIE, ICE CREAM. WE HAVE 3 LADIES HELPING US TO SERVE AND CLEAR AWAY, NOW IN THE 'NEW' VILLAGE HALL, WHERE WE GO AT 11.55. WE THEN PLAY INSIDE AND OUTSIDE THE BUILDING UNTIL 12.50 WHEN 'SCHOOL' OFFICIALLY BEGINS AGAIN!
